subject.geographic: Nina Plantation, one mile below Waterloo
Nina Plantation, one mile below Waterloo

mods.abstract: $25 REWARD. FOR the delivery in jail, or to me at "Nina" Plantation, one mile below Waterloo, the American griffe boy PORTER, about 5 feet 8 inches in height, aged about 19 years. Ranaway in August last. W. A. ADAMS. s24-4t
